name: Black & Decker Replacement Filter for Slide Pack Vacuums

reviews.name: Black & Decker Replacement Filter for Slide Pack Vacuums
reviews.reviewText: I was most pleased with the fast delivery of this product to my door. I wish I had opted for picking item up at Walmart to save the extra postage.
reviews.title: good service

reviews.name: Black & Decker Replacement Filter for Slide Pack Vacuums
reviews.reviewText: This is the only filter that is offered for the black and decker slider hand vac. The filter work as designed so what more is there to say.
reviews.title: All promises were fulfilled

reviews.name: Black & Decker Replacement Filter for Slide Pack Vacuums
reviews.reviewText: Great to have a replacement filter on hand for our 2 Slide Pack Vacuums. We have 3 cats and often the children and grandchildren bring their cats (5 in all). Lots of cat hair to filter out of the home. Works great.
reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.

reviews.name: Black & Decker Replacement Filter for Slide Pack Vacuums
reviews.reviewText: What can I say about a vacuum filter other than it fits, it works and it arrived on time.
reviews.title: replacement vacum filter
